text:
After a length of time that causes you feeling like you would step down into eternity, you arrive at a short hallway leading to a large room. You step into the room and observe your surroundings. Your heart skips a beat.

What you see is essentially a bridge. The sides of the path fade into nothingness. You reckon if you fell one way or another, you wouldn't die. You would just fall, fall, fall, and fall until you die of starvation. The lifeless husk of your body would just keep falling ad infinitum.
